definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Several young girls were sitting around looking bored.
sentences.chinese: 有幾個女孩兒沒精打彩地隨處坐著。

sentences.english: Don't let this get you down.
The great pall of the city's smoke hangs wearily above the valley.
sentences.chinese: 城市的濃重的黑煙沒精打彩地籠罩在山谷上空。

sentences.english: The anxiety of the past week have leave her exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 上星期把她愁得沒精打彩。

sentences.english: The tiger in the cage gnawed listlessly at a bone.
sentences.chinese: 籠子裏的老虎在沒精打彩地啃一根骨頭。

sentences.english: I guess I'll just have to pay the price and be sleepy.
sentences.chinese: 我想我付出的代價是整天都沒精打彩。
